page.title: 16 NORTH PONTYPOOL LOCAL
page.content: In{1985,}the{Borough Council}issued a{questionnaire}to guage local feel- ings about developing the area. {Some of the main points outlined in {the leaflet were:- {1)}The population has declined due mainly to people leaving the area. The remaining population is made up of a high percentage of elderly persons. {2)}Employment oppotunities are concentrated mainly in S.E. Pontypool, Cwmbran and Newport. {3)}Narrow roads and congestion. {4)}A number of settlements (e.g. Varteg, Wainfelin) each with its own identity. {5)}Majority of farmholdings are small(50 acres or less)and concerned mainly with the rearing of livestock Large area of commonland for grazing. {At the time of writing no results {were available.
